Variable.Name: Adjust
Variable.Comment: Number of seconds per hour (set 0 to indicate 3600)

Variable.Name: HoursRetain
Variable.Comment: Count of hours (updated only every HoursNo hours)

Variable.Name: Alrm
Variable.Comment: Signals that the maximum number of operating hours have been reached

Variable.Name: Q
Variable.Comment: TRUE when CLK rises from FALSE to TRUE. False in other cases

Variable.Name: Du
Variable.Comment: Down/Up, indicate the direction of count

Variable.Name: Enable
Variable.Comment: Enables the update of the output

Variable.Name: DeadBand
Variable.Comment: Semi-amplitude dead band (0.0 = NO dead band)

Variable.Name: ManMode
Variable.Comment: FALSE: Automatic internal PID controller, TRUE: Manual internal PID output override

Variable.Name: ItermSet
Variable.Comment: Set Integral term to a specified value

Variable.Name: ItermVal
Variable.Comment: Integral term value to be set

Variable.Name: CoolHeatMode
Variable.Comment: TRUE: Heating MODE, FALSE: - Cooling MODE

Variable.Name: DirRevMode
Variable.Comment: TRUE: Reverse MODE, FALSE: Direct MODE

Variable.Name: LimitedMODE
Variable.Comment: TURE: Limited PID output, FALSE: Unlimited PID output

Variable.Name: Sig_OUT
Variable.Comment: Limited output signal between low an upper limits

Variable.Name: Limit_ON
Variable.Comment: LIMITER status: 1 - LIMITER ON, 0 - LIMITER OFF

Variable.Name: t1
Variable.Comment: Time for previous input sample X1

Variable.Name: t2
Variable.Comment: Time for previous input sample X2

Variable.Name: t3
Variable.Comment: Time for previous input sample X3

Variable.Name: t4
Variable.Comment: Time for previous input sample X4

Variable.Name: t_1
Variable.Comment: Tempo relativo a X1 riscalato su t4

Variable.Name: t_2
Variable.Comment: Tempo relativo a X2 riscalato su t4

Variable.Name: t_3
Variable.Comment: Tempo relativo a X3 riscalato su t4

Variable.Name: t_4
Variable.Comment: Tempo relativo a X4 riscalato su t4

Variable.Name: Kp_1
Variable.Comment: Variabile "temporanea" per la gestione del termine proporzionale.

Variable.Name: XOUT_HeatMODE
Variable.Comment: Heating MODE Function Block main output

Variable.Name: XOUT_RevsMODE
Variable.Comment: Reverse MODE Function Block main output

Variable.Name: Limiter_ON
Variable.Comment: TRUE: Limiter working, FALSE: Limiter off

Variable.Name: Kp_1
Variable.Comment: Variabile temporanea per la gestione del termine proporzionale

Variable.Name: RIvar
Variable.Comment: Reset Integral term for internal managing (questa variabile di appoggio si rende necessaria perche non e possibile riassegnare le variabili in ingresso)

Variable.Name: I0var
Variable.Comment: Integral initial value for internal managing (questa variabile di appoggio si rende necessaria perche non e possibile riassegnare le variabili in ingresso)

Variable.Name: Iterm_p
Variable.Comment: Integral term at previous program cycle

Variable.Name: DeadBand
Variable.Comment: Semi-amplitude dead band (0.0 = NO dead band)

Variable.Name: ManMode
Variable.Comment: FALSE: Automatic internal PID controller, TRUE: Manual internal PID output override

Variable.Name: ItermSet
Variable.Comment: Set Integral term to a specified value

Variable.Name: ItermVal
Variable.Comment: Integral term value to be set

Variable.Name: CoolHeatMode
Variable.Comment: TRUE: Heating MODE, FALSE: - Cooling MODE

Variable.Name: DirRevMode
Variable.Comment: TRUE: Reverse MODE, FALSE: Direct MODE

Variable.Name: LimitedMODE
Variable.Comment: TURE: Limited PID output, FALSE: Unlimited PID output

Variable.Name: Sig_OUT
Variable.Comment: Limited output signal between low an upper limits

Variable.Name: Limit_ON
Variable.Comment: LIMITER status: 1 - LIMITER ON, 0 - LIMITER OFF

Variable.Name: t1
Variable.Comment: Time for previous input sample X1

Variable.Name: t2
Variable.Comment: Time for previous input sample X2

Variable.Name: t3
Variable.Comment: Time for previous input sample X3

Variable.Name: t4
Variable.Comment: Time for previous input sample X4

Variable.Name: t_1
Variable.Comment: Tempo relativo a X1 riscalato su t4

Variable.Name: t_2
Variable.Comment: Tempo relativo a X2 riscalato su t4

Variable.Name: t_3
Variable.Comment: Tempo relativo a X3 riscalato su t4

Variable.Name: t_4
Variable.Comment: Tempo relativo a X4 riscalato su t4

Variable.Name: Kp_1
Variable.Comment: Variabile "temporanea" per la gestione del termine proporzionale.

Variable.Name: XOUT_HeatMODE
Variable.Comment: Heating MODE Function Block main output

Variable.Name: XOUT_RevsMODE
Variable.Comment: Reverse MODE Function Block main output

Variable.Name: Limiter_ON
Variable.Comment: TRUE: Limiter working, FALSE: Limiter off

Variable.Name: Kp_1
Variable.Comment: Variabile temporanea per la gestione del termine proporzionale

Variable.Name: RIvar
Variable.Comment: Reset Integral term for internal managing (questa variabile di appoggio si rende necessaria perche non e possibile riassegnare le variabili in ingresso)

Variable.Name: I0var
Variable.Comment: Integral initial value for internal managing (questa variabile di appoggio si rende necessaria perche non e possibile riassegnare le variabili in ingresso)

Variable.Name: Iterm_p
Variable.Comment: Integral term at previous program cycle

Variable.Name: IN
Variable.Comment: if Rising edge, starts increasing internal timer. If Falling Edge, stops and resets internal timer

Variable.Name: Q
Variable.Comment: if TRUE, programmed time is elapsed

Variable.Name: IN
Variable.Comment: If Rising edge, starts increasing internal timer (if not already increasing). If FALSE and only if timer is elapsed, resets the internal timer. Any change on IN during counting has no effect.
